Description: On Rt. 628 in the County of Southampton, in the vicinity of Berlin Dory Rd; Rt. 626E/W (Southampton County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95R at mile marker 156.9 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect potential delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
